house_listing.house_description: This 3+ level detached single family home built in 1977 has 3 bedroom(s), 2 full bath(s)/2 half bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 3366 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
